plot: Eduardo, a succesful young architect about to marry beautiful, aristocratic Laura, has a recurrent dream about Amilamia, a little girl who was his sweetheart in his childhood. He tries to find her again and as his obsession grows, he alienates friends, family and his fiancée, leading to a bloody, shocking conclusion.   Written by  Anonymous
title: Muñeca reina
plot_es: Eduardo, a succesful young architect about to marry beautiful, aristocratic Laura, has a recurrent dream about Amilamia, a little girl who was his sweetheart in his childhood.
